sentence: Ordered a Kebab with the works mixed cooked meat salad and sour cream sour cream tasted a bit funny but didn't notice until half way through my Kebab because it was over powered with BBQ sauce and I'm starting to feel a bit nauseous I was the only one who ate a Kebab was the only thing I ate todayI had half this morning and put the other half wrapped in cling wrap in the fridge ate the other half 15 minutes ago until I noticed it didn't taste right
Vegan bowl w/ guac beans brown rice corn lettuce and tomato salsa

Dinner for son’s birthday had buffalo wings, burrito Colorado and I had Enchilada pork carnitas.  Pork looks like it was sitting out to long and pork looks pork chop. I paid $50.96 and a tip.   Hopefully they are not reusing what people don’t finish on their plate.  I got home and about 8pm, onset of diarrhea, vomiting and nausea and I’m still fighting the diarrhea.  I finally finished a bottle of water and 7up.  I don’t know what there thoughts are when they are cooking, not using fresh meet and I’m sure they are letting it sit out too long and finish using.  How can you keep your customers by getting them sick.  I left a message for  manager with another English speaking gentleman to have him call me.  I am still waiting for him to call.  No 10 hours of work for me and my children.  You need to think good health .  I hope and pray the cooks are well and not working while unhealthy.  Come on don’t do this to your customers..
toll house chocolate lover cookies ate some last week was sick & vomiting the next morning. ate fresh ones tonight & im nauseous
my mcflurry looked lumpy but i had already ate a few spoonfuls before i realised. i was sick about 4 hours later. my two friends got a mcflurry but theirs was fine and they aren’t sick

Walnut shrimp from a Chinese take out The shrimp smelled off but the third bite in it tasted just really off. Only myself ate it. I’m vomiting, severe diarrhea, fever, stomach cramping is so severe. It started about 6 hours after I ate. I literally cannot keep anything down, not even ice.
Mahi Mahi burgers It was a couple of hours after I ate the burger, I got really sick
I ate the carbs asada tacos with sriracha bacon rice and pinto mashers last night. I’ve been having terrible diarrhea all morning, and i’ve also been slightly nauseous.
I went in to get some food the other day. This bald mexican looking dude was staring at me from the kitchen.

My son got explosive diarrhea within two hours of dinner and I had a weird side effect - my lips went numb and I got very dizzy after eating here. I was actually worried I may have been poisoned - not food poisoning but maybe they put something in the food? ????♀?? My son got explosive diarrhea within two hours of eating a bean and cheese taco and I had lip numbness and tingling and weakness and dizziness within 30 minutes of eating

Chicken Pot Pie Cooked in oven & ate at 3:00pm with Ginger Ale/OJ drink. Nausea started around 11pm. Gas started shortly thereafter. By 11:30pm, I couldn’t get out of the bathroom for more than 5 minutes. Lasted about 2 hours. Took 3 Tums for nausea. I’m convinced this is the only reason I didn’t vomit. Next day, woke with nausea & there were three more extended visits to the toilet. Diarrhea finally stopped around 3pm but nausea started up again. 24 hours later & Marie is now an unwanted houseguest.
I ate in n out yesterday a cheeseburger with fries and had diarrhea for a day and a half , with excessive nausea!

Food poisoning I think from eating prepared meatloaf late Sunday nite. Bought here. Explosive diarrhea & stomach cramps....cold clammy sweat & nearly fainting. Haven't felt good for days. I checked expiration date....does not expire for a few more days. Must have been off temp.Started about 8 hours after eating it.

pre-cooked corned beef Precooked corn beef purchased on 3/10/20. ?Refrigerated, unopened. ?Opened and heated on stove top 3/18. ?Put in refridge. ?3/19 eaten by person A at 4pm. ?No problem. ?Eaten from refridge by person B at 9 pm. ?Person B had severe vicious projectile vomiting at 7am-11am. ?4 others in home had eaten corned beef earlier then person A and B but had no problems.

raw spinach raw kale weird looking beans seeds , when eating for lunch felt my stomach turning but continued, later on i tried to finish but could not, felt bloated n nausea, until sleeping time difficult to sleep n p**p. could not eat dinner
French dip roast beef 5 hours after eating French dip roast beef with au jus.. Gas then urgent vomit then nausea
I ate at about 3 pm yesterday and started throwing up at 4 am the next day. My body and head hurts, I’ve gotten lightheaded and hot then cold and shivering.
Seafood chowder there Are chowder at 4pm sick at 7:15
Not sure I ordered it off uber eats around 2PM. I got the meals I ordered for myself and the family around 2.20pm. I personally ate a large Quarter pounder cheese burger meal with mozzarella dippers.

I had bought these dark grapes on March 16th.  At home I washed some about 10. Was eating them while I put up the groceries.   Then that night I had terrible belly pain, then the vomiting started. For the last 2 days I have vomited a lot , with a terrible headache. No fever, but I do have some congestion, so I don’t think I have the coron 19, I think it is food poisoning from those grapes, they were strange texture inside, so took them back with explanation.
Absolutely wonderful. I make fashwash from this.

I have looked in so many stores all over town and for some reason, this tea is hard to find where I live. Once in awhile I will locate it at Big Lots or somewhere like that, but that's rare, which is weird since I live in a bigger city so you'd think I'd be able to find it. Nope. Lucky for me it was listed on Amazon for a really good price. I admit that I do prefer their organic oolong, but this one is really good as well.
This honey has a wonderful flavor.  The solid state make it much less messy when measuring out for baking.  The fact that it is organic and unprocessed is great.  It's a very healthy product.
The taste is great!!
Love this tea and can't find locally.
Its strong to me if made as directed. I used 4 oz of concentrate to make 2 quarts of juice.
Great Product!
Is an excellent shake I highly recommend it.

This stuff is awesome..... So much better tasting than artificial honey and I am sure it is beneficial from a health stand point.... I put this in tea, on a pb&j or in my sons juice when he is feeling a little under the weather...So many uses..... Will buy again

I bought this in hopes that it would be a good 'filler' because I am always hungry. It has a nice nutty taste and can be put in a variety of foods. It also tastes fine by itself with some milk. It helps to keep me full longer, and is packed with healthy nutrients.
Wheat germ is said to be good for your diet. I will try eating the Wheat germ over the next few months and see how I feel and if I want to try it again.
I canned both apple pie filling and bluberry pie filling with this stuff. I love it. The order arrived very quickly and package well.
as advertized
My favorite honey, other than my local raw honey. Love, love, love!
Very good! I sure do enjoy adding this to my smoothies.
This is the absolute best honey I have ever had. Amazing! If your unsure about this then just take my advice and shut up and buy it because it's worth it. I promise!
Totally Awesome
The flavor is just what I was looking for.  I brew the tea 5 minutes in one cup of boiling water and heat a cup of whole milk inthe microwave and pour together -- NO sugar.  It is a great pick me up.
Been buying these for more than 5 years now.. but I doubt I will be anymore as I moved Canada :(

This is my favorite tea but my local store doesn't carry it. So after running to several of the local grocery stores my husband said I should order it on Amazon. Which I never thought of for something like tea. I'm glad he made the suggestion. The tea was close to half the price per box as the grocery store and now I have 6 boxes to keep me in tea for awhile.Flavor is like a herbal chia. Cinnamon-y
